short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Teto makes it easy to learn Estonian by defining unfamiliar words while reading articles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Teto is a useful tool for anyone looking to improve their Estonian language skills. The plugin allows you to easily navigate through articles written in Estonian, identifying and defining any unfamiliar words with just a simple highlight. This feature makes learning the language much more efficient, allowing you to quickly understand new vocabulary and improve your comprehension. Teto is a great resource for language learners of all levels and can be used in conjunction with traditional language learning methods.
